name: NIGHT NURSE
description:
Prepare for your first lockup as the Night Nurse in Haughton Psychiatric Hospital!

The doctor has left instructions for the night. Deliver the medpacks to the right patients, leave through the exit door. Simple. The lights and power are faulty, but do your best to ignore them. A job so easy it makes you wonder what could have happened to the last Night Nurse…

 

DO   NOT   LOOK   AT   HER
